      • getAppContext

      • setAppContext

        public static void setAppContext(android.content.Context appContext)

      • init

        public static void init(android.content.Context appContext)
        Init Configure
        参数:
        appContext - A context of application is needed for Configure

      • getConfig

        public static <T> java.lang.Object getConfig(java.lang.String key,
                                             T defaultVal)
        Returns a configuration of this application The configuration is saved as SharedPreferences, and its file name is "config.xml"
        类型参数:
        T - Type of defaultVal
        参数:
        key - The tag of an item to save, it is also the tag of xml tag
        defaultVal - If the item has not been saved yet or something wrong happened, defaultVal will be returned
        返回:
        Saved value, defaultVal will be returned if key has not been saved Notice: You have to cast return value
        另请参阅:
        getSharedPref(String, Object, String)

      • getData

        public static <T> java.lang.Object getData(java.lang.String key,
                                           T defaultVal)
        Returns a data set of this application The data is saved as SharedPreferences, and its file name is "data.xml"
        类型参数:
        T - Type of defaultVal
        参数:
        key - The tag of an item to save, it is also the tag of xml tag
        defaultVal - If the item has not been saved yet or something wrong happened, defaultVal will be returned
        返回:
        Saved value, defaultVal will be returned if key has not been saved Notice: You have to cast return value
        另请参阅:
        getSharedPref(String, Object, String)

      • setConfig

        public static <T> void setConfig(java.lang.String key,
                                 T value)
        Save a configuration item into config.xml
        类型参数:
        T - Type of value
        参数:
        key - The tag of configuration item, it is also the tag of xml tag
        value - The value to save
        另请参阅:
        editSharedPref(String, Object, String)

      • setData

        public static <T> void setData(java.lang.String key,
                               T value)
        Save a data item into config.xml
        类型参数:
        T - Type of value
        参数:
        key - The tag of data item, it is also the tag of xml tag
        value - The value to save
        另请参阅:
        editSharedPref(String, Object, String)

      • getSharedPref

        private static <T> java.lang.Object getSharedPref(java.lang.String key,
                                                  T defaultVal,
                                                  java.lang.String prefType)
        Get SharedPreference settings
        类型参数:
        T - The type of defaultVal
        参数:
        key - Tag of an item
        defaultVal - Default value of the item, if key cannot be found or other error occurs, defaultVal will be the return value
        prefType - To show which pref file is the item from
        返回:
        Saved value, or defaultVal if the item has not been saved

      • editSharedPref

        private static <T> void editSharedPref(java.lang.String key,
                                       T value,
                                       java.lang.String prefType)
        Edit a SharedPreference item
        类型参数:
        T - Type of value
        参数:
        key - Tag of the item
        value - Value to save
        prefType - To show which pref file will be edit
